body: Oldnevergold your are FUCKING GOD DAMN RIGHT in every single point except “ art style is okay.” The story is so fucked up. Hope that the boy just uses his horse dick(if he has one) to have a revenge in the end.

its fucking hentai for christ sake, dont take it too serious and dont self insert, you loser.

Dramus feels out of place with his work here.

The story is stupid not because of the Ntr but because no one is likeable or relatable. The childhood friend just seemed to have given up, or just imagines the good old days. The girl is a slut and the old man is a piece of shit who'd probably throw her ass out when he gets tired of her or she gets pregnant. 

The author is kinda messed doing that kinda story and it seems he just wants the shock value, the story is shit and the art is okay but it's not exactly exciting. The girl is hot but her fucking the ugly man is off putting because every scene with her has him covering her like shit on good food. 

It isn't Ntr but the feeling of heartbreak and betrayal is there, friendship and love is shit when she can get fucked like a cheap whore bemy a loser who probably is a low level thug. 

It's just cruel and I think that's too much for people who just want to jack off and then go on. 

It's like playing dark souls when all you want is stardew
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga

Cock > Heart NTR Confirmed.
